definition: insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen

sentences.english: February was definitely not a good month for the automobile industry in America.
sentences.chinese: 二月份铁定是美国汽车工业销售惨淡的一个月。

sentences.english: Today all that seems pale and thin and very far away.
sentences.chinese: 现在，一切都显得疏落惨淡，一切都远离我们而去。

sentences.english: The cause they contrived so painstakingly also ended in failure.
sentences.chinese: 他们惨淡经营的事业也以失败而告终。

sentences.english: The autumn crop is far more prone to failure than the summer one.
sentences.chinese: 可以预计的是秋季票房收入比夏季还要惨淡。

sentences.english: Tourism are down and many hotels are operating in the red.
sentences.chinese: 旅游业在走下坡路，许多酒店惨淡经营，入不敷出。

sentences.english: IT IS not difficult to be pessimistic about the future of European business.
sentences.chinese: 谈及欧洲未来的经济状况，总是让人觉得愁云惨淡。

sentences.english: Hodgson's future at Liverpool has come under intense scrutiny following a disastrous start to the season.
sentences.chinese: 赛季开局惨淡，霍奇森在安菲尔德的未来备受关注。

sentences.english: Reductions in construction jobs limit growth, further depressing housing markets.
sentences.chinese: 承包工程的减少抑制了增长，进一步使得房市惨淡。

sentences.english: That winter was a hard time for most property developers.
sentences.chinese: 那年冬天，很多房地产商惨淡经营。

sentences.english: The chilly wind bleak, staged a thrilling scene of supernatural events.
sentences.chinese: 阴风惨淡的港府，上演着一幕幕惊心动魄的灵异事件。

sentences.english: What I've sketched out is the real possibility for a dim, if not dismal future for the transatlantic alliance.
sentences.chinese: 我描绘的是这个跨大西洋联盟惨淡的未来。

sentences.english: After several years' hard work, the business finally turned around.
sentences.chinese: 几年的惨淡经营后，生意终于出现了转机。

sentences.english: Real macho man presume orthoptic miserably thin life.
sentences.chinese: 真正的猛男，敢于直视惨淡的人生。

sentences.english: But not all the news was bleak in the folk world in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 但2009年关于民乐界并非一片愁云惨淡。

sentences.english: The backdrop, of course, is the economic downturn, which is hitting Ireland particularly hard. The forecasts are dire.
sentences.chinese: 这当然是因为经济衰退造成的，经济预测一片惨淡。

sentences.english: The dawn came in bleakly a few minutes later.
sentences.chinese: 过了几分钟，新一天的黎明在惨淡的气氛中来临。

definition: spectacle too horrible to endure (idiom); tragic sight/appalling scenes of devastation
the end/an ending/to wind down/to conclude
to be of no interest to anyone (idiom)
rivers pour away by the day (idiom); going from bad to worse/deteriorating day by day
to develop rapidly after abrupt turn (idiom); dramatic change
by contrast/but as for this.../viewed from another angle/subjectively/introspection
